about_the_game:
Imagine you're a secret princess, robbed of her voice, and you had an amazing adventure. If only you could tell your mother what happened! Mother lost her eyes, many years ago.

Step into Ava's world, where music speaks louder than words.
Here, every note depicts a name, every melody has a story to tell.
Here, you must listen to the sounds, and let the harmony guide you.

Piece together Ava's Story as she plays a magic artifact that can render her memories in your mind.
This is LightBreak,
A Narrative-based Musical Puzzle Game.
